lead_paragraph: The starting guard Rich Seubert signed a three-year extension with the Giants on Tuesday, keeping him under contract through 2012. Seubert’s career nearly ended in 2003 when his right leg was broken in three places in a game against Philadelphia. He had an operation and missed the 2004 season, then played in four games in 2005.
